Test Name: Bleeding Disorders Focused Gene Panel â€“ Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Specimen Type: Blood or tissue sample (for DNA extraction)
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with bleeding disorders using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Appropriate specimen container for DNA extraction (e.g., EDTA blood tube or sterile tissue container)
Equipment: Next-generation sequencing system (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher), fluorometer, qPCR machine, automated electrophoresis instrument (Bioanalyzer/TapeStation), bioinformatics workstation
